duties_responsibilities.duty: Create, publish, and maintain content across the CMS platform, from research and ideation stage to ongoing content auditing and editorial QA.
Manage workflow, assign tasks to team members, and ensure brand voice consistency with clients.
Collaborate with team to standardize workflows and improve content quality and efficiencies.
Track and report on daily content processing, and support both user and business goals through accurate content management.
Manage and update content and campaigns under the direction of the team lead, and analyze track analytics and prepare insights.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Communications, English, Writing, Technical Writing, Journalism, Content Strategy, or UX Design (Advanced degree is a plus)
